gw.api.web.payment

Interface AllocationStrategy

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ReturnPremiumAllocationStrategy

    public interface AllocationStrategy
    Interface for a Payment Distribution allocation strategy, which determines how to distribute some amount of funds across a set of Distribution Items (BaseDistItem).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allocate(java.util.List<BaseDistItem> distItems, AllocationPool amountToAllocate)

      • allocate
